ivardefs.name: addresses_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies problems, conditions, issues, or concerns the goal is intended to address.

ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: Indicates a category the goal falls within.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Human-readable and/or coded description of a specific desired objective of care, such as "control blood pressure" or "negotiate an obstacle course" or "dance with child at wedding".

ivardefs.name: documentation_
ivardefs.desc: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the goal that provide further supporting information about the goal. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the expected level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the defined goal.

ivardefs.name: start
ivardefs.desc: The event after which the goal should begin being pursued.

ivardefs.name: target_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates what should be done and within what timeframe.

properties.desc: Goals that describe what the activities within the plan are intended to achieve. For example, weight loss, restoring an activity of daily living, obtaining herd immunity via immunization, meeting a process improvement objective, etc.
